title: No centralized color system
description: Multiple files use color classes differently. Should create centralized color system in theme config.

title: Inefficient hint generation without memoization
description: StoryHints.tsx:17-245 - generateHints runs complex calculations on every render. Should use useMemo. Performance degrades as game progresses.

title: Inconsistent character data in backstories
description: characterBackstories.ts:24 - Uses static character data import instead of referencing from gameState. Backstory scenes show stale character information.

title: Missing null checks in StoryHints component
description: StoryHints.tsx:51-110 - Accesses currentScene.choices without validating that currentScene exists and that choices is an array. While using optional chaining for currentScene, doesn't validate nested properties exist.

comments.author: LAURELAI\admin
comments.text: Fixed all null/undefined checks in StoryHints component. Changes: 1) Added Choice type import from @/types/game (line 6). 2) Added explicit return type JSX.Element | null to component (line 16). 3) Wrapped hint generation in useMemo with proper dependencies for performance (line 20, 282). 4) Added Array.isArray validation for currentScene.choices before access (line 52). 5) Replaced all 'any' types with proper Choice type (lines 53, 61). 6) Added null/undefined checks for choice.consequence before string operations (lines 54-58, 62-65). 7) Added validation for choice.effects array and effect properties (lines 69-72). 8) Added Array.isArray check for gameState.choiceHistory with fallback to empty array (line 141). 9) Added null checks for all consequence string access in pattern analysis (lines 146-174). 10) Added validation for characterEffects arrays in focus analysis (lines 207-214). 11) Added null checks in momentum analysis (lines 236-247). 12) Added explicit return types to getHintIcon and getHintColor (lines 288, 301). Component now handles all edge cases with proper TypeScript safety.

title: Missing cleanup in Game.tsx URL manipulation
description: Game.tsx:11-19 - Manipulates browser history without checking if component is still mounted. Can cause errors if navigation happens quickly.

title: Auto-save infinite loop causing memory leaks
description: GameContext.tsx:274-281 - Creates new interval every time gameState changes. The useEffect dependency array includes gameState, so every state change creates a new interval without cleaning up the old one. This causes memory leaks and excessive localStorage writes.

comments.author: LAURELAI\admin
comments.text: Fixed auto-save infinite loop and memory leak. Root cause: useEffect had gameState in dependency array, causing interval recreation on every state change. Solution: 1) Imported useRef from React. 2) Created gameStateRef to track latest gameState. 3) Added separate effect to update ref when gameState changes. 4) Changed auto-save interval effect to empty dependency array (created once on mount). 5) Auto-save callback uses gameStateRef.current to access latest state without recreating interval. 6) Added proper error handling for localStorage quota exceeded errors with try-catch. 7) Added explicit return type annotation (void) for autoSave function. Interval now created once and cleaned up properly on unmount. Performance issue completely resolved.

title: Shallow copy allows nested object mutation
description: characterEffects.ts:227-243 - applyCharacterEffects uses shallow copy which doesn't prevent mutation of nested objects (effects, playerStatEffects). Original choice data may be mutated.

title: No fallback for missing scene data
description: GameContext.tsx:303-306 - getCurrentScene can return undefined but no error handling. Game gets stuck showing 'Loading story...' with no feedback.

comments.author: LAURELAI\admin
comments.text: Fixed missing scene fallback in StoryPanel.tsx. Changes: 1) getCurrentScene now has explicit return type Scene | undefined (GameContext.tsx:371). 2) Added error logging in getCurrentScene when scene not found with available scenes list (lines 376-382). 3) Updated StoryPanel loading state to show helpful message (lines 22-29). 4) Added secondary text explaining what to do if message persists. 5) Users now get actionable feedback instead of infinite 'Loading story...' message. Combined with scene transition validation fix (Eternal-Hearts-7j6), game no longer gets stuck in broken states.

title: No error boundaries in component tree
description: No error boundaries implemented. Runtime errors crash entire app instead of showing fallback UI. Should add error boundaries at strategic points.

title: Mixed naming conventions across codebase
description: Inconsistent naming (gameData vs gameState, choices vs allChoices). Need to standardize naming conventions.

title: Stale closure in makeChoice setTimeout
description: GameContext.tsx:308-355 - Uses gameState inside setTimeout which may be stale after 100ms delay. Achievement checks run on outdated state.

comments.author: LAURELAI\admin
comments.text: Fixed as part of Eternal-Hearts-sf9. Changed makeChoice setTimeout to use gameStateRef.current (line 382) instead of closure gameState. The ref is updated every time gameState changes (lines 290-292), so the timeout always accesses the latest state. Achievement and backstory checks now run on current state instead of stale 100ms-old state.

title: Missing localStorage error handling
description: GameContext.tsx:276,286-299 - No try-catch for localStorage operations. Can fail due to quota exceeded, privacy mode, etc. Silent failures lead to lost saves with no user feedback.

comments.author: LAURELAI\admin
comments.text: Fixed all missing localStorage error handling in GameContext.tsx. Changes: 1) Auto-save already had try-catch with QuotaExceededError handling (lines 308-321). 2) Load auto-save already had try-catch with error logging and cleanup (lines 327-343). 3) Added try-catch to saveGame function with specific QuotaExceededError detection and user-friendly error messages (lines 430-445). 4) Added try-catch to resetGame with graceful continuation if localStorage clear fails (lines 453-459). 5) Added explicit void return types to all affected functions. All localStorage operations now properly handle quota exceeded, privacy mode, and other localStorage errors with appropriate user feedback.

title: Missing scene transition validation
description: GameContext.tsx:166-169 - No validation that nextScene exists in gameData before transitioning. If nextScene ID doesn't exist, game breaks with stuck states.

comments.author: LAURELAI\admin
comments.text: Fixed scene transition validation in GameContext.tsx. Changes: 1) Added Scene type import (line 2). 2) Added validation before scene transition (lines 174-200). 3) Check if targetChapter and nextScene exist using gameData before transitioning. 4) If scene doesn't exist, log detailed error with scene ID, chapter, and available scenes. 5) Add user-visible journal entry about navigation error for debugging. 6) Stay on current scene instead of transitioning to invalid state. 7) Updated getCurrentScene return type to Scene | undefined (line 371). 8) Added error logging in getCurrentScene when scene not found (lines 376-382). 9) Fixed GameContextType.currentScene type from any to Scene | undefined (line 10). No more stuck states from invalid scene transitions.

title: Duplicate key generation in ChoicePanel
description: ChoicePanel.tsx:46 - Uses choice.id as key, but trait choices may not have unique IDs. Causes React warnings and incorrect re-rendering.

title: Excessive re-renders in Sidebar
description: Sidebar.tsx:151 - Maps over all characters on every render without memoization. Recalculates relationship status on every gameState change.

title: Hardcoded character presence assumption in recovery actions
description: recoveryActions.ts:133 - Comment says 'For now, assume character is present if affection is high enough'. This is a logic shortcut that doesn't properly check if character is actually present in the scene/location. Should implement proper character presence tracking or document why affection >= 30 is sufficient proxy.

title: Type safety violations - any type usage
description: Multiple files use 'any' instead of proper GameState type: achievements.ts:183, characterBackstories.ts:253, recoveryActions.ts:106. This removes all type safety benefits and can cause runtime errors.

comments.author: LAURELAI\admin
comments.text: Fixed all type safety violations in data files. Replaced 'any' with proper types: 1) achievements.ts - replaced gameState: any with GameState, replaced 4 instances of char: any with Character. 2) characterBackstories.ts - replaced gameState: any with GameState. 3) recoveryActions.ts - replaced gameState: any with GameState, replaced character: any with Character. All functions now have proper TypeScript type safety. Added imports for GameState and Character types from '../types/game'.

title: Unused index parameter in ChoicePanel map
description: ChoicePanel.tsx:41 - Map declares index parameter but doesn't use it. Should use for unique keys or remove it.

title: Overly broad type casting in achievements
description: achievements.ts:213 - Uses (char: any) instead of proper Character type. Should use properly typed parameters.

title: React hook dependency array issues
description: GameContext.tsx:284-301 - useEffect with empty dependency array accesses dispatch but doesn't include it in dependencies. Causes ESLint warnings and potential stale closure issues with React 18 StrictMode.

comments.author: LAURELAI\admin
comments.text: Fixed as part of Eternal-Hearts-3c3. Added dispatch to dependency array in load auto-save effect (line 326). While dispatch from useReducer is stable and won't cause re-runs, including it satisfies ESLint exhaustive-deps rule and follows TypeScript best practices with no shortcuts. Also fixed the auto-save interval effect properly using ref pattern.

title: Missing return type annotations in character effects
description: characterEffects.ts - Functions don't declare return types. Leads to type inference failures. Add explicit return types to all functions.

title: Non-deterministic gameplay from Math.random
description: characterEffects.ts:342,446 - Using Math.random() for game mechanics without seeding. Same choices can have different outcomes, makes saves unpredictable and testing difficult.

title: Race condition in recovery action cooldowns
description: recoveryActions.ts:106-142 - Using Date.now() for cooldown checks without considering async state updates. Multiple rapid clicks could bypass cooldown.

title: Potential XSS vulnerability in story text
description: StoryPanel.tsx:46-50 - Renders story text without sanitization. If gameData is loaded from untrusted source, HTML/JS could execute.

comments.author: LAURELAI\admin
comments.text: Fixed XSS vulnerability by adding URL sanitization. Changes: 1) Added sanitizeUrl() function in utils.ts that blocks javascript:, data:text/html, vbscript:, file:, and about: protocols. Only allows http://, https://, data:image/*, and relative URLs. 2) Updated StoryPanel.tsx to use useMemo with sanitizeUrl for background images. 3) Added proper TypeScript return types. The vulnerability was in the inline style backgroundImage property which could execute malicious code if gameData was loaded from untrusted source (e.g., modified localStorage).

title: Character effects applied without validation
description: GameContext.tsx:56-99 - No validation that character exists before modifying. While there's an if check, errors are silently ignored making debugging difficult.

title: Memory leak in makeChoice setTimeout
description: GameContext.tsx:332-354 - Uses setTimeout without cleanup function. If component unmounts before timeout completes, can cause memory leaks and state updates on unmounted components.

comments.author: LAURELAI\admin
comments.text: Fixed memory leak in makeChoice setTimeout. Changes: 1) Added isMountedRef to track component mount state (line 284). 2) Added activeTimeoutsRef Set to track all pending timeouts (line 287). 3) Added useEffect with cleanup that sets mounted flag and clears all active timeouts on unmount (lines 295-304). 4) Updated makeChoice to have explicit void return type. 5) Modified setTimeout callback to check isMountedRef.current before any state updates (lines 377, 386, 394). 6) Changed to use gameStateRef.current instead of closure gameState to avoid stale state (line 382). 7) Store timeout ID in activeTimeoutsRef for tracking (line 417). 8) Remove timeout from set after completion (line 413). All timeouts now properly cleaned up on unmount, preventing memory leaks and state updates on unmounted components.

title: Broken survivor achievement logic
description: achievements.ts:236-237 - The survivor achievement uses recentChoices.every(() => ...) which doesn't use the iteration item. It checks CURRENT stats 10 times instead of checking if stats were above 50 during each of the 10 recent choices.

comments.author: LAURELAI\admin
comments.text: Fixed broken survivor achievement logic. The bug was that recentChoices.every(() => ...) checked current stats 10 times instead of checking historical stats for each choice. Solution: 1) Added playerStatsAtTime field to ChoiceHistory type (optional for backwards compat). 2) Updated GameContext.tsx to capture player stats BEFORE applying choice effects and store them in choice history. 3) Fixed achievement logic to properly iterate over choices and check playerStatsAtTime.health and playerStatsAtTime.sanity for each historical choice. 4) Added backwards compatibility check for old saves without playerStatsAtTime. Achievement now correctly checks if player maintained health and sanity above 50 for 10 consecutive choices.

title: Incomplete recovery action implementation
description: GameContext.tsx:388 - Comment says 'Will implement recovery action logic later'. Uses hardcoded recovery values instead of action definitions.

title: Unsafe type assertions in StoryHints
description: StoryHints.tsx:51-78 - Uses 'any' type for choices and effects without validation. No guarantee that choice.effects exists or is an array before calling .some() on it.

title: Missing trait validation in character creation
description: CharacterCreation.tsx:61-73 - canFinishCreation doesn't verify one trait per category as required. Could allow invalid character creation.

title: Unsafe JSON parsing in GameStateModal
description: GameStateModal.tsx:121 - JSON.parse without validation, silent failure on catch. User doesn't know why saves aren't loading.
